title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Elementary Students' English Reading Skills Using Mobile Blended Reading Circles

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately comprehend three or more English texts per week through mobile app-based reading activities.
Learners can demonstrate a collaborative reading attitude with peers by participating at an 80%+ rate in reading circle discussions.
Learners can improve vocabulary acquisition rates by 40% or more using pre-, during-, and post-reading strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
